title: Twilight Dye
summaries: Twilight Dye is a Hardmode dye acquired by giving a Strange Plant to the Dye Trader. It can, like other dyes, be equipped in the dyes slot in the player's equipment or accessory tabs in their inventory. When the dye is used, the armor or vanity item associated with it will get a very night-sky-like effect which will move dynamically with the player.

statistics.Sell: 1 GC50 SC
